sys_data_source.name: Lansweeper Peripheral - Monitor
sys_data_source.sql_statement:
SELECT -- Monitors - as attached to a parent device tblAssets.AssetID , tblAssets.Assettype , tblSystemEnclosure.SMBIOSAssetTag AS AssetTag , 'Hardware' AS Category , tAssetComments.Comment AS Comments , (SELECT TOP 1 ParentAssetID FROM tblAssetRelations WHERE ParentAssetID = tblAssets.AssetID AND tblAssetRelations.Type = (SELECT RelationTypeId FROM tsysAssetRelationTypes WHERE Name = 'Connected To')) AS Computer , CAST(tblAssets.AssetID AS VARCHAR) + ':' + CAST(tblMonitor.MonitorID AS VARCHAR) + ':' + COALESCE(RTRIM(LTRIM(tblMonitor.SerialNumber)), '') AS CorrelationID , 'Lansweeper' AS DiscoverySource
, tblAssets.Firstseen AS FirstDiscovered , tblAssets.FQDN AS FQDN , 1 AS InstallStatus , tblAssets.IPAddress AS IPAddress , tblAssets.Lastseen AS MostRecentDiscovery , tblAssets.Mac AS MACAddress
, tblMonitor.MonitorManufacturer AS Manufacturer , tblMonitor.MonitorModel AS ModelID , tblMonitor.MonitorModel AS ModelNumber
, 'Monitor' + ':' + tblAssets.AssetName + ':' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY tblAssets.ASsetName ORDER BY tblAssets.ASsetName) AS VARCHAR(4)) AS [Name] , tblState.Statename AS OperationalStatus , tblAssetCustom.PurchaseDate AS Purchased , tblMonitor.Serialnumber AS SerialNumber , tblAssets.Description AS ShortDescription , 'Peripheral' AS Subcategory , 'monitor' AS Type , tblAssets.Domain AS Domain , tblAssetCustom.Warrantydate AS WarrantyExpiration , 'Peripheral' AS SourceName FROM tblAssets INNER JOIN tsysAssetTypes atype ON tblAssets.Assettype = atype.AssetType LEFT OUTER JOIN tblAssetCustom ON tblAssets.AssetID = tblAssetCustom.AssetID LEFT OUTER JOIN tblSystemEnclosure On tblAssets.AssetID = tblSystemEnclosure.AssetID LEFT OUTER JOIN TsysChassisTypes ON tblSystemEnclosure.ChassisTypes = TsysChassisTypes.Chassistype
INNER JOIN tblMonitor ON tblAssets.AssetID = tblMonitor.AssetID LEFT OUTER JOIN tblState ON tblState.State = tblAssetCustom.State LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT AssetID , MAX(Added) AS Added , MAX(Comment) AS Comment FROM tblAssetComments GROUP BY AssetId )tAssetComments ON tAssetComments.AssetID = tblAssets.AssetID WHERE -- Docking Station form factors were causing duplicates TsysChassisTypes.ChassisName NOT IN ('Docking Station', 'Peripheral')
